title: The Godfather Part II
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Adapted From Other Material
description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

title: Chinatown
description: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

title: Blazing Saddles
description: In order to ruin a western town, a corrupt politician appoints a black Sheriff, who promptly becomes his most formidable adversary.

title: The Conversation
description: A paranoid, secretive surveillance expert has a crisis of conscience when he suspects that the couple he is spying on will be murdered.

title: Young Frankenstein
description: An American grandson of the infamous scientist, struggling to prove that his grandfather was not as insane as people believe, is invited to Transylvania, where he discovers the process that reanimates a dead body.

title: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre
description: Five friends visiting their grandfather's house in the country are hunted and terrorized by a chain-saw wielding killer and his family of grave-robbing cannibals.

title: A Woman Under the Influence
description: Although she loves her husband and children, a woman's unusual behavior and mental instability leads to conflict with her family.

title: The Towering Inferno
description: At the opening party of a colossal, but poorly constructed, office building, a massive fire breaks out that threatens to destroy the tower and everyone in it.

title: Murder on the Orient Express
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: In December 1935, when his train is stopped by deep snow, detective Hercule Poirot is called on to solve a murder that occurred in his car the night before.

title: Lenny
description: The story of acerbic 1960s stand-up comedian Lenny Bruce, whose style of open, free-style and critical form of comedy catapulted him into stardom and trouble.

title: Alice Doesn't Live Here Anymore
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: A recently widowed woman is on the road with her precocious young son, determined to make a new life for herself as a singer.

title: Harry and Tonto
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
description: When his apartment building is demolished, an elderly New Yorker travels across the country with his beloved cat Tonto.

title: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three
description: In New York, armed men hijack a subway car and demand a ransom for the passengers. Even if it's paid, how could they get away?

title: The Great Gatsby
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring Original Song Score and/or Adaptation
description: A Midwesterner becomes fascinated with his nouveau riche neighbor, who obsesses over his lost love.

title: Earthquake
description: Various people struggle to survive when a major earthquake of magnitude 9.9 hits the city of Los Angeles.

title: The Little Prince
description: A pilot, stranded in the desert, meets a little boy who is a prince on a planet.

title: The Apprenticeship of Duddy Kravitz
description: A young Jewish man from Montreal tries to make a name for himself in 1948 society.

title: Claudine
description: A single black mother on welfare in Harlem meets a dashing garbage collector.

title: The Longest Yard
description: A sadistic warden asks a former pro quarterback, now serving time in his prison, to put together a team of inmates to take on (and get pummeled by) the guards.

title: Thunderbolt and Lightfoot
description: With the help of an irreverent young drifter, a bank robber gets his old gang back together to organize a daring new heist.

title: California Split
description: A casual gambler befriends a professional one and begins to emulate his lifestyle, sinking deeper into the world of high-stakes betting.

title: The Parallax View
description: An ambitious reporter gets in way-over-his-head trouble while investigating a senator's assassination which leads to a vast conspiracy involving a multinational corporation.

title: Death Wish
description: A New York City architect becomes a one-man vigilante squad after his wife is murdered by street punks in which he randomly goes out and kills would-be muggers on the mean streets after dark.

title: The Man with the Golden Gun
description: James Bond is led to believe that he is targeted by the world's most expensive assassin while he attempts to recover sensitive solar cell technology that is being sold to the highest bidder.

title: Bring Me the Head of Alfredo Garcia
description: An American barroom pianist and his prostitute girlfriend go on a trip through the Mexican underworld to claim the bounty on the head of a dead gigolo.

title: Phantom of the Paradise
description: A disfigured composer sells his soul for the woman he loves so that she will perform his music. However, an evil record tycoon betrays him and steals his music to open his rock palace, The Paradise.

title: Dark Star
description: In the far future, a small crew of men aboard the scout ship Dark Star is tasked with destroying unstable planets, but they have to deal with a series of mishaps and their own boredom.

title: Zardoz
description: In the distant future, a savage trained only to kill finds a way into the community of bored immortals that alone preserves humanity's achievements.

title: Black Christmas
description: During their Christmas break, a group of sorority girls are stalked by a stranger.

title: F for Fake
description: Documentary about fraud and fakery, focusing on art forger Elmyr de Hory and Clifford Irving, who wrote a fraudulent autobiography of Howard Hughes.

title: Celine and Julie Go Boating
description: Two young women become friends and find themselves drawn into a mysterious house where a strange melodrama plays out daily.

title: Ali: Fear Eats the Soul
description: A lonely widow meets a much younger Arab worker in a bar during a rainstorm. They fall in love, to their own surprise and to the outright shock of their families, colleagues, and drinking buddies.

title: The Enigma of Kaspar Hauser
description: A young man named Kaspar Hauser suddenly appears in Nuremberg in 1828, barely able to talk or walk, and bearing a strange letter.

title: Scenes from a Marriage
description: Ten years within the life of a married couple is detailed, from the disintegration of their marriage to their subsequent reconciliation.

title: Amarcord
description: A series of comedic and nostalgic vignettes set in a 1930s Italian coastal town.

title: Lacombe, Lucien
description: A French farmboy rejects the Resistance and joins the Gestapo, but falls for a Jewish girl.

title: The Night Porter
description: A former concentration camp survivor discovers her former torturer and lover working as a night porter at a hotel in postwar Vienna.

title: Swept Away
description: A wealthy woman and a sailor are shipwrecked on an island, where he takes the opportunity to exact his revenge on her.

title: The Sugarland Express
description: A woman attempts to reunite her family by helping her husband escape prison and kidnapping their son. But things don't go as planned when they are forced to take a police hostage on the road.

title: Thieves Like Us
description: Two convicts break out of prison and go on a bank robbing spree in the 1930s South, picking up a girl along the way.

title: Daisy Miller
description: In 1878, a free-spirited American woman in Europe is courted by a young American expatriate, but her refusal to adhere to social codes leads to tragedy.

title: The Front Page
description: A newspaper editor uses every trick in the book to keep his ace reporter from quitting.

title: The Gambler
description: Axel Freed is a literature professor. He has a gambling addiction that spirals out of control.

title: Airport 1975
description: A 747 in flight collides with a small plane, leaving the pilots incapacitated and the flight attendant having to take over the controls.

title: Benji
description: A stray dog saves two kidnapped children.

title: Herbie Rides Again
description: Herbie the Volkswagen Beetle helps an old lady protect her home from a corrupt developer.

title: Phase IV
description: Desert ants suddenly form a collective intelligence and begin to wage war on the inhabitants.

title: Female Trouble
description: A spoiled schoolgirl runs away from home, gets pregnant while hitch-hiking, and descends into a life of crime.

title: Captain Kronos: Vampire Hunter
description: A vampire hunter and his assistant fight a vampire in a village.

title: It's Alive
description: A couple's newborn child turns out to be a mutant monster that kills when it is frightened.

title: Gone in 60 Seconds
production_studio: H.B. Halicki Junkyard and Mercantile Company
description: Insurance investigator Maindrian Pace and his team undertake an unstoppable theft of 48 cars for a drug lord.

title: Truck Turner
description: A former football player turned bounty hunter is hired to find a pimp who has skipped bail.

title: Foxy Brown
description: A voluptuous black woman takes a job as a high-class prostitute in order to get revenge on the mobsters who murdered her boyfriend.

title: The Street Fighter
description: Terry Tsurugi is a mercenary martial artist who is hired by the Yakuza to kidnap a wealthy heiress, but when they refuse to pay him, he protects her instead.
